title: Novartis ' spending on research and development by segment 2017 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart has 3 categories for the x axis of Company representing 2017, 2018, and 2019.
The highest category is found at Innovative Medicines with a mean value of 7.816666666666666.
The second highest category is found at Sandoz with a mean value of 0.9433333333333334.
